ingredients.ingredient: 1 ¼ cups HONEY MAID Graham Crumbs
2 (250 g) packages PHILADELPHIA Light Brick Cream Cheese Spread, softened
4 cups mixed fresh berries (blueberries, blackberries, raspberries, strawberries)
2 cups thawed COOL WHIP Light Whipped Topping

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese completely at room temperature for smooth texture
Fold whipped topping gently at the end to maintain airy texture
Chill for at least 4 hours or overnight for best flavor and firmness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I prevent this no-bake cheesecake from becoming too dense or grainy?
